query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS goal_reminders (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  goal_id INT NOT NULL,
  reminder_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  scheduled_for TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  error_message TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES user_goals(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_goal_reminders_goal_id (goal_id),
  INDEX idx_goal_reminders_scheduled (scheduled_for),
  INDEX idx_goal_reminders_status (status)
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  goal_id INT NOT NULL,
  reminder_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  scheduled_for TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  error_message TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES user_goals(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_goal_reminders_goal_id (goal_id),
  INDEX idx_goal_reminders_scheduled (scheduled_for),
  INDEX idx_goal_reminders_status (status)
)
